result.problem: Other ______ I have but I no need them.
result.chn: 其它的功能有但是我不需要。()

result.problem: Senator Amy Klobuchar, a Michigan Democrat, said Americans at all levels but ______ the middle class continue to struggle.
In announcing the program, Mr.Zuma said many people are afraid to be tested because of the stigma ______ with HIV.

Huxley points out, "How it is that anything so remarkable as a state of consciousness comes about as a result of ______ nervous tissue, is just as unaccountable as the appearance of the Djinn " - of the genie " when Aladdin rubs his lamp."
result.chn: 赫胥黎提出,"刺激人的神经组织,便能产生像意识状态这般奇异之物,这就好比阿拉丁一擦神灯,巨神灵就闪现出来一样魔幻,无法解释(心理学导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: I could actually swipe a card and ______ electronic receipt via email and then send it out to a person.
result.chn: 这下，我真的能刷刷卡，发一封邮件，把电子回执,发给对方。(Twitter之父Jack.Dorsey演讲：好奇和灵感的力量课程节选 : 斯坦福公开课)

result.problem: (Speaking) Waxler says the agency should have provided better oversight and employed tougher standards for dealing with ______ effects of LASIK.

The Egyptian magicians who are initially able to ______ some of the plagues that are brought on by God--they are quickly bested, and Yahweh's defeat of the magicians is tantamount to the defeat of the gods of Egypt.
result.chn: 埃及的巫师最初只会模仿,上帝制造的瘟疫，巫师们随后就被打败了，耶和华战胜了巫师相当于,打败了埃及的众神。(旧约导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: ______ the sponge along the longitude and latitude at an altitude.
result.chn: 沿着经度和纬度在一高度延长海绵。 。()

result.problem: WHO says if her attempts to ______ pregnancy fail, she turns to someone without adequate medical qualifications.
And I ______ to sit down and improvise. Within those improvisations certain motives and ideas will come about that I like."
Georgian opposition leaders are accusing President Mikheil Saakashvili for staging the alleged coup plot to ______ attention from domestic problems.
What Gauss did was said, let's fit a line through the point-- the ______ of points--and that's called the regression line.
result.chn: 高斯说,做这样的一条直线,切合所有散点,这就是回归直线(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: I am making light of it and I think it's somewhat justified, because the evidence is just so ______.
result.chn: 我很鄙视这个观点,我认为我是有道理的,因为证据实在太有限(古希腊历史简介课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: And in the ______ infinity of time, how do i matter?
result.chn: 然而在这浩瀚无尽的时间里，我有算什么？()

result.problem: This machinery is so ______ that a human hair couldn't even pass between the heads and spinning platters, yet it all works in terrific speeds.
result.chn: 这些设备是很紧密的以至于人的头发,都不能在头和旋转的磁盘之间通过，尽管如此，它的运行速度非常快。(计算机科学课程节选 : 哈佛公开课)
